Introducing Jigit Studio - Your Personal Touch to Async Conversations

Hey there! Meet Jigit Studio, the tool that's changing the game when it comes to expressing yourself visually. With just a single click, you can record your screen, camera, and audio, and instantly share your moments with a special link.

Why Jigit Studio?
